notes: [Improved] Report succeeded sent state back to Craft's Email Service (works from a future release, [click here](https://github.com/craftcms/cms/pull/2917) ).
[Fixed] Viewing outbound message details when having HTML only.
[Fixed] Settings to activate outbound registration on send correctly.
[Added] Viewing message details in Craft UI.
[Added] User interface for reading outbound messages from Mandrill.
[Added] Console command for daily synchronizing the outbound.
[Fixed] Correctly passing the email subject to Mandrill.
[Added] Support for Mandrill's message sent-at feature. Schedule messages.
[Fixed] Double rendering Twig template when using email messages system.
[Fixed] Overriding and setting user to send message to from event.
[Fixed] Overriding and setting email model from event.
[Fixed] Removed debug dump from Mandrill service.
